    name="my-example-app",
    search_application={
        "indices": [

        ],

            "script": {
                "lang": "mustache",
                "source": "\n        {\n          \"query\": {\n            \"bool\": {\n              \"must\": [\n              {{#query}}\n              {\n                \"query_string\": {\n                  \"query\": \"{{query}}\",\n                  \"search_fields\": {{#toJson}}search_fields{{/toJson}}\n                }\n              }\n              {{/query}}\n            ]\n            }\n          }\n        }\n      ",

                    "query": "",
